INDEFINITE.Definition: not fixed, without a specific end date

HUNG.Definition: suspended or placed in a high position

HANG.Definition: are suspended or attached at a higher point

PIPE DREAM.Definition: unrealistic or impractical idea or goal

EXTINCT.Definition: no longer in existence, having died out

MORTALITY.Definition: the fact that he was going to die

VIABLE.Definition: capable of working successfully or realistically

LIFESPAN.Definition: the length of time that a living thing is expected to survive

LEFTOVER.Definition: remaining after the rest has been used or consumed

WINDOW.Definition: limited period during which it can happen

METABOLIC PROCESSES.Definition: chemical reactions in the body that maintain life

CELLS.Definition: basic structural and functional units of organisms

TISSUES.Definition: groups of cells with similar functions

PROCEDURE.Definition: a series of actions or steps to accomplish the task

UNTRAINED EYES.Definition: untrained or uneducated perspective or view

ARTISANAL.Definition: made in a traditional or non-mechanised way

MONEY WAS NO OBJECT.Definition: there weren't any financial constraints or limitations

KEEN ON.Definition: very interested in or enthusiastic about

LUMP SUM.Definition: single, large payment or amount of money

ELEPHANT IN THE ROOM.Definition: obvious problem or issue that is being ignored

ROUTINELY.Definition: regularly and as a standard procedure

HARNESSED.Definition: utilised or controlled for that purpose

BURIAL.Definition: the act of placing her dead body in a grave

PATIENTLY.Definition: in a patient or tolerant way, without rushing

FUNDAMENTALLY.Definition: in a basic and important way

PERCEPTION.Definition: the way it is understood or interpreted

ETHICS.Definition: moral principles or standards of behaviour

MIND BOGGLINGLY.Definition: to an extremely surprising or astonishing degree

WHISKED AWAY.Definition: quickly and suddenly taken or transported

INEVITABLY.Definition: as a natural consequence or result, unavoidably

DEGRADATION.Definition: loss of or decline in quality or condition

MONUMENTAL.Definition: of great significance or importance, enormous

THOUGHT-PROVOKING.Definition: causing deep thought or reflection, inspiring contemplation
